participant_1.background:
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others.
people say i have a cute laugh.
i just moved from va to pa.
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.

participant_2.background:
I am a successful novelist, but my mother is still worried about my horror novels.
I'm a food blogger who loves to share my favorite restaurant finds with my readers.
I'm not into superheroes, but I love to capture the beauty of the rain and my cats.
I have a mobile that plays music and lights up to help my baby sleep.
I have a big, black truck that I love taking to the mountains on the weekends.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! Just moved to PA from VA, so still getting settled in. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a novelist and a food blogger, so I'm pretty busy with work, but I'm loving it.
That sounds awesome! I'm a writer too, but I'm more into poetry and short stories. Do you have any books published?
Yes, I have a few horror novels out. My mother is still worried about them, but I think they're great!
I love horror novels! I'm not sure if I could ever write one, though. I'm too scared of the dark.
Ha! Well, you can always just read my books and let me live vicariously through you.
That's a good idea! I'll check them out.
Great! I hope you like them.
So, what do you do for fun in your free time?
I love to read, go for walks, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things, but I also love to take pictures of nature and my cats.
That's cool! I love taking pictures too. I'm not very good at it, but it's still fun.
Good! I'm sure you'll be a pro in no time.
